attributes.action: confirm that he supports the principle that local govenrment boundary changes in the UK should not be made when the majority of affected residents oppose the change. For example 100% of the 41 home owners in Princes Gate Bishopbriggs who pay council tax to East Dunbartonshire Council and wish to remain within  East Dunbartonshire should not be forced to become part of Glasgow City council given their unanimous opposition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For full details see http://sites.google.com/site/bbboundary

The LGBC is ignoring our community ties in favour of a prettier line on a map. This cannot be acceptable.
